Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Civic Hall, Uppermill Prizes - 1st £100 and cup, 2nd £50 and rose bowl, 3rd £25 and shield. March contest (Own choice) - 1st Lockwood(88) Knight Templar, 2nd Slaithwaite(87) Conquest, 3rd Wingates(86)High Command.
